blogPost.excerpt: All Hands is a collection of 25 high res photos, featuring hands of all shades, shapes, and sizes, holding iOS devices. Download the layered PSD mockups, add your screens, and diversify how you present your work.
blogPost.body: All Hands is a collection of 25 high res photos, featuring hands of all shades, shapes, and sizes, holding iOS devices. Download the layered PSD mockups, add your screens, and diversify how you present your work.
blogPost.title: The All Hands Collection - Diversify your product mockups
blogPost.author: Jacques H. Bastien

localize.description: 所有的手是25张高分辨率照片的集合，以各种色调，形状和大小的手为特色，手持iOS设备。下载分层的PSD模拟图，添加你的屏幕，让你的作品呈现方式多样化。
localize.tagline: 使你的产品模拟图多样化

localize.description: 所有的手是25張高分辨率照片的集合，以各種色調，形狀和大小的手爲特色，手持iOS設備。下載分層的PSD模擬圖，添加你的屏幕，讓你的作品呈現方式多樣化。
localize.tagline: 使你的產品模擬圖多樣化

previous.excerpt: DataMool is a predictive, residential real estate investment analysis tool, which helps you to find and to analyze the best investment opportunities nearby.
previous.title: DataMool - Predictive property investment opportunities. Worldwide.

localize.description: DataMool是一款预测性的住宅房地产投资分析工具，它可以帮助您找到并分析附近的最佳投资机会。
localize.tagline: 预测房产投资机会。全球范围内。

localize.description: DataMool是一款預測性的住宅房地產投資分析工具，它可以幫助您找到並分析附近的最佳投資機會。
localize.tagline: 預測房產投資機會。全球範圍內。

next.excerpt: DrillRoom introduces AI for interactive pocket billiards training. Practice your fundamentals with the assistance of a virtual coach. Get real time feedback. Know your stats and track your progress over time. Level Up your game!
next.title: DrillRoom - AI-powered billiard training & stats

localize.description: DrillRoom引入AI进行互动式口袋台球训练。在虚拟教练的协助下练习你的基本功。获得实时反馈。了解您的统计数据，并随着时间的推移跟踪您的进展。提升你的游戏水平!
localize.tagline: AI驱动的台球训练与统计

localize.description: DrillRoom引入AI進行互動式口袋檯球訓練。在虛擬教練的協助下練習你的基本功。獲得實時反饋。瞭解您的統計數據，並隨着時間的推移跟蹤您的進展。提升你的遊戲水平!
localize.tagline: AI驅動的檯球訓練與統計
